docs.snippet: The Western Union Telegraph Company yesterday sold an issue of $15,000,000 fifteen-year non-callable 6  per cent. gold bonds to Kuhn, Loeb  Co., which will be offered for subscription today at 99 Per cent. of par and accrued interest, to yield...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Western Union Telegraph Company yesterday sold an issue of $15,000,000 fifteen-year non-callable 6 per cent. gold bonds to Kuhn, Loeb Co., which will be offered for subscription today at 99 Per cent. of par and accrued interest, to yield appreximately 6.60 per cent. if held to maturity.

headline.main: WESTERN UNION'S BONDS GO ON SALE; $15,000,000 Issue Offered Today by Kuhn, Loeb & Co.to Yield 6.60.URUGUAY ISSUE SOLD OUTLongmeadow, Mass., and EastOrange Flotation Among New Municipal Securities.

docs.snippet: Gold valued at approximately $10,000,000 arrived at the Port of New York yesterday, to be distributed among financial institutions and eventually to find its way into the vaults of the Assay Office.
